ai-patthana8.5:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
ai-patthana8.5:1.1_0: But if, not even for the sake of investigating, he gives rise to diversity of principles.
ai-patthana8.5:1.1_1: But if, for the sake of investigating, he doesn’t gain for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.5:1.1_2: But for the sake of this reason, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.5:2.1_0: No cause for the sake of investigating ...
ai-patthana8.5:2.1_1: No cause for the sake of investigating ...
ai-patthana8.5:2.1_2: No matter for the sake of demon pushing vision or for the sake of decorating principle.
ai-patthana8.5:3.1_0: But for the sake of health or not for the sake of principle, nor for the sake of health.
ai-patthana8.5:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
